item.title: When Does a User Get Logged Out of Yammer?
item.description: When a user logs in to Yammer on the web, mobile application or authenticate with a Yammer app, they get a token. The token for the Yammer mobile application and to a Yammer app will be valid as long as the user is active (and they didnâ€™t revoke access to the app). On the web the session has the lifetime of the browser (See Session timeouts for Office 365 this article for more details).
